Articles.Content:
How do you get the source code for the stock modules?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T18:37:56Z" title="05/05/2015 06:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by NathanKell**

Squad has not released the source for its modules. Decompiling to see what the source (more or less) is, [is prohibited by the Add-On Rules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87841).

However, the community's generally happy to answer questions from our collective knowledge/memory, if you have specific questions.
